subject: Re: [junit] Where the code meets the file
msgSnippet: ... That qualifies it as a design tool in my book.  And an analysis tool, for that matter.  Proactive testing is just a beneficial side effect. Mike -- Mike
messageBody:
"J. B. Rainsberger" wrote:

> Notice, everyone, how the test tool suggested a change that makes this
> class more generally useful. Hmmmm.
>

That qualifies it as a design tool in my book. And an analysis tool, for
that matter. Proactive testing is just a beneficial side effect.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
